Module com.example.JAVAdb
Package com.robertSchofield.JAVAdb.DAOs

Class appointmentDAO

java.lang.Object
com.robertSchofield.JAVAdb.DAOs.appointmentDAO
public class appointmentDAO extends Object
This class is responsible for managing and interacting with appointment data in the database. It provides methods for retrieving, adding, updating, and deleting appointments. It also provides methods for retrieving appointment statistics and data.

    • getUpcomingAppointments

      public static javafx.collections.ObservableList<appointments> getUpcomingAppointments(int minutes)
      Retrieves a list of upcoming appointments based on the specified number of minutes.
      Parameters:
      minutes - The number of minutes in the future to consider as upcoming appointments.
      Returns:
      An observable list of upcoming appointments.

    • delete

      public static void delete(appointments appointment)
      Deletes a specific appointment from the database based on the appointment ID.
      Parameters:
      appointment - The appointment object containing the appointment ID to delete.

    • listAll

      public javafx.collections.ObservableList<appointments> listAll()

      Returns:

    • listByContactId

      public javafx.collections.ObservableList<appointments> listByContactId(int contactId)
      Retrieves a list of appointments associated with a specific contact ID.
      Parameters:
      contactId - The unique identifier of the contact.
      Returns:
      An observable list of appointments associated with the given contact ID.

    • listByCustomerId

      public javafx.collections.ObservableList<appointments> listByCustomerId(int customerID)
      Retrieves a list of appointments associated with a specific customer ID.
      Parameters:
      customerID - The unique identifier of the customer.
      Returns:
      An observable list of appointments associated with the given customer ID. If no appointments are found, an empty observable list is returned. If an error occurs during the database query, the error is caught and printed, and an empty observable list is returned.

    • find

      public appointments find(appointments appointment)
      Finds and retrieves a specific appointment based on the appointment ID.
      Parameters:
      appointment - The appointment object containing the appointment ID to find.
      Returns:
      The found appointment object, or a new appointment object if no appointment is found.

    • getAppointment

      public appointments getAppointment(int appointmentId)
      Retrieves a specific appointment based on the appointment ID.
      Parameters:
      appointmentId - The unique identifier of the appointment.
      Returns:
      The found appointment object, or null if no appointment is found.

    • update

      public void update(appointments appointment)
      Updates an existing appointment in the database based on the appointment object provided.
      Parameters:
      appointment - The appointment object containing the updated appointment data.

      Adds a new appointment to the database based on the appointment object provided.
      Parameters:
      appointment - The appointment object containing the new appointment data.

      Retrieves a list of all appointment types and their respective counts from the database.

      An observable list of appointment types and their counts.
